{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Secretary",
  "description": "Jobvet Services - Our client,&nbsp;a&nbsp;reputable retail store in Gwarinpa, Abuja, is&nbsp;recruiting to fill the position below:&nbsp;

Job Position: Secretary

Job Location:&nbsp;Utako, Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The ideal candidate will handle administrative duties, support daily operations, and ensure smooth communication between staff, management, and customers.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage correspondence, phone calls, and emails.
	Maintain and organize office files, records, and documents.
	Schedule meetings, appointments, and assist with daily office routines.
	Handle basic bookkeeping, record keeping, and inventory support.
	Greet visitors and provide friendly customer service..


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Secretary, Administrative Assistant, or similar role.
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills.


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 Monthly.&nbsp;

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should&nbsp;send their Applications to:&nbsp;jobvet24@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Secretary Job at Jobvet Services




        
    

        
        Jobvet Services - Our client, a reputable retail store in Gwarinpa, Abuja, is recruiting to fill the position below: 

Job Position: Secretary

Job Location: Utako, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The ideal candidate will handle administrative duties, support daily operations, and ensure smooth communication between staff, management, and customers.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage correspondence, phone calls, and emails.
	Maintain and organize office files, records, and documents.
	Schedule meetings, appointments, and assist with daily office routines.
	Handle basic bookkeeping, record keeping, and inventory support.
	Greet visitors and provide friendly customer service..


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Secretary, Administrative Assistant, or similar role.
	Strong organizational and multitasking skills.


Salary
N70,000 - N80,000 Monthly. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: jobvet24@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Restaurant Manager",
  "description": "Jobvet Services - Our client is recruiting experienced and organized candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing daily restaurant operations, managing staff, ensuring excellent customer service, and maintaining high-quality standards in food and service delivery.


Key Responsibilities


	Supervise and coordinate all restaurant operations.
	Manage staff schedules, training, and performance.
	Ensure top-notch customer experience and resolve any service issues promptly.
	Monitor inventory, supplies, and cost control.
	Work closely with the kitchen and service teams to maintain efficiency and consistency.
	Implement health, safety, and hygiene standards.
	Develop and execute strategies to boost sales and customer retention.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Restaurant Manager or in a similar supervisory role.
	Strong leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Knowledge of food safety regulations and hospitality best practices.
	A customer-oriented attitude and attention to detail.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N200,000 Monthly
	Accomodation and Feeding.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should&nbsp;send their Applications to:&nbsp;jobvet24@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2025-11-15",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

  },

    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",

       "streetAddress": ". ",

}



Restaurant Manager Job at Jobvet Services




        
    

        
        Jobvet Services - Our client is recruiting experienced and organized candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Restaurant Manager

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The ideal candidate will be responsible for overseeing daily restaurant operations, managing staff, ensuring excellent customer service, and maintaining high-quality standards in food and service delivery.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Supervise and coordinate all restaurant operations.
	Manage staff schedules, training, and performance.
	Ensure top-notch customer experience and resolve any service issues promptly.
	Monitor inventory, supplies, and cost control.
	Work closely with the kitchen and service teams to maintain efficiency and consistency.
	Implement health, safety, and hygiene standards.
	Develop and execute strategies to boost sales and customer retention.


Requirements


	Proven experience as a Restaurant Manager or in a similar supervisory role.
	Strong leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills.
	Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Knowledge of food safety regulations and hospitality best practices.
	A customer-oriented attitude and attention to detail.


What We Offer


	Salary: N150,000 - N200,000 Monthly
	Accomodation and Feeding.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: jobvet24@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
